attributes.action: Extradite foreign criminals who commit crime in UK
attributes.additional_details: These Foreigners who commit crime here should lose there right to live here so they need extradition back to there own countrys.
attributes.background: The government need to clamp down on foreigners who commit crime in the UK from appealing to there extraditions and also clamp down on the lawyers who represent these people and stop the free legal aid these criminals who claim it.

rejection.details:
It's already a requirement for the Home Secretary to seek the deportation of foreign national offenders, other than in limited circumstances. You can read more here: https://commonslibrary.parliament.uk/research-briefings/cbp-8062/

In addition, extradition is the process of agreeing to extradite people residing in the UK to foreign countries where they have been charged with a crime. You can find out more UK extradition policy and agreements here: https://www.gov.uk/guidance/extradition-processes-and-review
